Translations.Text: vema kane limu'miniv vela mu'minetin iza kada-llahu verasuluhu emran ey yekune lehumu-lhiyeratu min emrihim. vemey ya`si-llahe verasulehu fekad dalle dalalem mubina

veiz tekulu lillezi en`ame-llahu `aleyhi veen`amte `aleyhi emsik `aleyke zevceke vetteki-llahe vetuhfi fi nefsike me-llahu mubdihi vetahse-nnas. vellahu ehakku en tahsah. felemma kada zeydum minha vetaran zevvecnakeha likey la yekune `ale-lmu'minine haracun fi ezvaci ed`iyaihim iza kadav minhunne vetara. vekane emru-llahi mef`ula
ma kane `ale-nnebiyyi min haracin fima ferada-llahu leh. sunnete-llahi fi-llezine halev min kabl. vekane emru-llahi kaderam makdura
ellezine yubelligune risalati-llahi veyahsevnehu vela yahsevne ehaden ille-llah. vekefa billahi hasiba
ma kane muhammedun eba ehadim mir ricalikum velakir rasule-llahi vehateme-nnebiyyin. vekane-llahu bikulli sey'in `alima
huve-llezi yusalli `aleykum vemelaiketuhu liyuhricekum mine-zzulumati ile-nnur. vekane bilmu'minine rahima
